channel.title: [Paying] Initiatin CrystalChest.java in Dementhium 639

item.title: [Paying] Initiatin CrystalChest.java in Dementhium 639
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

I’ve been trying to initiate CrystalChest.java but it doesn’t seem to work… This is what i did:

Added:

to the top of ItemOnObjectHandler.java, then for the Item On Object portion:

} else if (def.getName().toLowerCase().equals("closed chest")) { if (player.getInventory().contains(989)) { if (!player.getInventory().contains(989)) { player.sendMessage("You do not have a crystal key."); return; } player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(989)); player.getInventory().addItem(new ChanceItem(CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWARDS)); player.getInventory().refresh(); player.sendMessage("You open the Closed Chest."); return; }

Now… The errors i get, which i cannot seem to fix because i have no idea what i’m doing…

Compiling SARAVERSKNAMEHAR... src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\DialogueHandler.java:98: type parameters o f <T>T cannot be determined; no unique maximal instance exists for type variable T with upper bounds int,java.lang.Object int slot = player.getAttribute("destroyItemSlot" , null); ^ src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java:198: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CRYSTAL_CHEST_REWARDS location: class org.dementhium.net.packethandlers.ItemOnObjectHandler player.getInventory().addItem(new ChanceItem(CRY STAL_CHEST_REWARDS)); ^ src\org\dementhium\net\packethandlers\ItemOnObjectHandler.java:198: internal err or; cannot instantiate org.dementhium.content.misc.ChanceItem.<init> at org.deme nthium.content.misc.ChanceItem to () player.getInventory().addItem(new ChanceItem(CRY STAL_CHEST_REWARDS)); ^ 3 errors Complete Press any key to continue . . .

If somebody could help me that would be wonderful, i just don’t understand whats wrong and its seemingly aggravating.

I am now paying.
